import React, { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; const RestaurantImage = () => { // State to keep track of the index of the active image const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0); // Handle mouse over event to update the active image index const handleMouseOver = (index) => { setActiveIndex(index); }; return (
{/* Use activeIndex to determine which image has the 'active' class */}
{/* Pass index to handleMouseOver when the mouse is over a card */}
handleMouseOver(0)}>
handleMouseOver(1)}>
handleMouseOver(2)}>
handleMouseOver(3)}>
handleMouseOver(4)}>
); }; export default RestaurantImage;
